name: Payments to Territories – Adults
objective: To provide aid in the form of cash benefits for food, clothing, shelter, and/or other essentials to the aged, blind, and the permanently disabled in Guam, Puerto Rico, and the Virgin Islands.
top_agency_name: Department of Health and Human Services

results.description: Three grants were awarded in FY 2016. Three grants were awarded in FY 2016.
Three grants were awarded in FY 2017.
Three grants were awarded in FY 2018.
Three grants were awarded in FY 2019.
Three grants were awarded in FY 2020.
Three grants were awarded in FY 2021.
Three awards were made in FY 2022.
Three awards were made  in FY 2023.
It is anticipated that three awards will be made in 2024.
It is anticipated that three awards will be made in 2025.

authorizations.text: XVI, Social Security Act. 42 U.S.C. § 1381 notes.

rules_regulations: Specific regulations are found at 45 CFR Parts 201-206 and 213-237.
